com.appglu
Interface SyncOperations

All Superinterfaces:
TableChangesJsonParser
All Known Implementing Classes:
SyncTemplate
public interface SyncOperations
extends TableChangesJsonParser

SyncOperations is used to synchronize the data in your local SQLite tables with the AppGlu server.

Since:
1.0.0
See Also:
AsyncSyncOperations

Method Summary
 TableChanges changesForTable(String tableName, long version)
          The returned TableChanges will contain rows if the server version of the table is higher that the local one.
 List<TableChanges> changesForTables(List<TableVersion> tables)
          Return a list of TableChanges, one for each specified TableVersion.
For each TableChanges returned, it will contain rows if the server version of that table is higher that the local one.
Since the response can be very large, to consume less memory, the use of changesForTables(List, TableChangesCallback) may be more appropriate.
 void changesForTables(List<TableVersion> tables, TableChangesCallback tableChangesCallback)
          Returns the same result as changesForTables(List).
 void changesForTables(TableChangesCallback tableChangesCallback, TableVersion... tables)
          Returns the same result as changesForTables(TableVersion...).
 List<TableChanges> changesForTables(TableVersion... tables)
          Return a list of TableChanges, one for each specified TableVersion.
For each TableChanges returned, it will contain rows if the server version of that table is higher that the local one.
Since the response can be very large, to consume less memory, the use of changesForTables(TableChangesCallback, TableVersion...) may be more appropriate.
 void downloadChangesForTables(InputStreamCallback inputStreamCallback, TableVersion... tables)
          Returns the same result as changesForTables(TableVersion...).
 void downloadChangesForTables(List<TableVersion> tables, InputStreamCallback inputStreamCallback)
          Returns the same result as changesForTables(List).
 List<TableVersion> versionsForTables(List<String> tables)
          Return the current server table version for the specified table names.

          Return the current server table version for the specified table names.
 
Methods inherited from interface com.appglu.impl.json.TableChangesJsonParser
parseTableChanges
 

Method Detail

changesForTable

TableChanges changesForTable(String tableName,
                             long version)
                             throws AppGluRestClientException
The returned TableChanges will contain rows if the server version of the table is higher that the local one.

Parameters:
tableName - the name of the table
version - this is the local version from the last time this table was synchronized
Returns:
new, updated or deleted rows for this table if the server version of the table is higher that the local one
Throws:
AppGluRestClientException

changesForTables

List<TableChanges> changesForTables(TableVersion... tables)
                                    throws AppGluRestClientException
Return a list of TableChanges, one for each specified TableVersion.
For each TableChanges returned, it will contain rows if the server version of that table is higher that the local one.
Since the response can be very large, to consume less memory, the use of changesForTables(TableChangesCallback, TableVersion...) may be more appropriate.

Parameters:
tables - table names and versions
Returns:
a list of TableChanges
Throws:
AppGluRestClientException

changesForTables

List<TableChanges> changesForTables(List<TableVersion> tables)
                                    throws AppGluRestClientException
Return a list of TableChanges, one for each specified TableVersion.
For each TableChanges returned, it will contain rows if the server version of that table is higher that the local one.
Since the response can be very large, to consume less memory, the use of changesForTables(List, TableChangesCallback) may be more appropriate.

Parameters:
tables - table names and versions
Returns:
a list of TableChanges
Throws:
AppGluRestClientException

changesForTables

void changesForTables(TableChangesCallback tableChangesCallback,
                      TableVersion... tables)
                      throws AppGluRestClientException
Returns the same result as changesForTables(TableVersion...). However, instead of parsing the whole response and return it all together, it will parse one table and one row at a time and send that to the provided TableChangesCallback.
The advantage is that it will consume less memory, but the parsing code is more complex. Since changes can be a very large response, this method is more appropriate.

Parameters:
tableChangesCallback - a callback to receive the tables and rows that were changed
tables - table names and versions
Throws:
AppGluRestClientException

changesForTables

void changesForTables(List<TableVersion> tables,
                      TableChangesCallback tableChangesCallback)
                      throws AppGluRestClientException
Returns the same result as changesForTables(List). However, instead of parsing the whole response and return it all together, it will parse one table and one row at a time and send that to the provided TableChangesCallback.
The advantage is that it will consume less memory, but the parsing code is more complex. Since changes can be a very large response, this method is more appropriate.

Parameters:
tableChangesCallback - a callback to receive the tables and rows that were changed
tables - table names and versions
Throws:
AppGluRestClientException

downloadChangesForTables

void downloadChangesForTables(InputStreamCallback inputStreamCallback,
                              TableVersion... tables)
                              throws AppGluRestClientException
Returns the same result as changesForTables(TableVersion...). However, a raw InputStream is returned so it is possible to save the JSON response to disk or other type of storage.

Parameters:
inputStreamCallback - the callback that will receive the raw InputStream
tables - table names and versions
Throws:
AppGluRestClientException

downloadChangesForTables

void downloadChangesForTables(List<TableVersion> tables,
                              InputStreamCallback inputStreamCallback)
                              throws AppGluRestClientException
Returns the same result as changesForTables(List). However, a raw InputStream is returned so it is possible to save the JSON response to disk or other type of storage.

Parameters:
inputStreamCallback - the callback that will receive the raw InputStream
tables - table names and versions
Throws:
AppGluRestClientException

versionsForTables

List<TableVersion> versionsForTables(String... tables)
                                     throws AppGluRestClientException
Return the current server table version for the specified table names.

Parameters:
tables - table names
Returns:
the versions of those tables
Throws:
AppGluRestClientException

versionsForTables

List<TableVersion> versionsForTables(List<String> tables)
                                     throws AppGluRestClientException
Return the current server table version for the specified table names.

Parameters:
tables - table names
Returns:
the versions of those tables
Throws:
AppGluRestClientException
